videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Rakdos Meld almost won a huge tournament! Standard MTG Arena
videos.description:
I can't believe this Mishra Meld deck almost won a competitive event!  Benjamin Graves came in second place in the ANZ Super Series with this creative list.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/HnT-3NrkYkmuBBL1OXJ3UQ

Sponsors

videos.title: Yu-Gi-Oh player crashes out over BUSTED Magic cards
videos.description:
